item.description:
Another opportunity for a meetup with Chris.....

 

It's time to have some fun with hypnosis/NLP and our minds......

We will use the power of hypnosis and NLP to use the subconscious mind to access the information to FIND lost items!  

Have you lost your keys? important papers? wallet/purse? gifts from loved ones? etc. etc.

You know the feelings you get when you lose something....PANIC, FRUSTRATION, SELF-INFLICTED NEGATIVE COMMENTS (How could I be so stupid to lose that!), SHAME, ETC. 

Yes it is TRUE you can access the subconscious mind to set up patterns in the mind to retrieve the information needed to find these items that are lost and causing you STRESS.  

Come find out how you can access the mind to work for you..........
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs in the Story Hour Room

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Hypnosis/NLP for Finding Lost Things !
